basics.name: Liam Schenk
basics.label: Mediamatics Specialist Apprentice
basics.summary: Hi, I’m Liam, a mediamatics specialist apprentice at Swisscom. I’m passionate about graphic design, and I love learning new things, especially when it comes to web design. In my free time, you’ll probably find me listening to music or podcasts, picking up inspiration along the way.

work.name: Swisscom
work.summary: During my apprenticeship as a mediamatics specialist, I have worked in various departments at Swisscom and gained experience in all areas of multimedia.
highlights: I have led various multimedia projects and contributed to video and photo productions.
I have designed and implemented physical products.
I have gained experience in web design and acquired knowledge in various CMS and website builders.

volunteer.summary: In August 2023, I assisted with both First Steps at Swisscom, where I introduced new apprentices to the company and provided them with important information and useful tips.
highlights: I guided and supported the new apprentices in setting up their IT devices.
I gave presentations on various topics and shared my knowledge.

volunteer.summary: At Motion, we conducted and recorded an interview with Heinz Frei in collaboration with Pascal Schwendimann. We also hosted a livestream for the event.

projects.name: Point of Sales — Print Media Design
projects.description: At POS, I lead the decoration tour process within a team and manage the corresponding blog for Swisscom shops. In addition, I occasionally designed print media. Below is a selection of my work in this area.

projects.name: Point of Sales — Glücksmaschine Animation
projects.description: For the Glücksmaschine, I developed an animation and screensaver. Customers could participate by scanning a QR code in the shop for a chance to win prizes.
